pdf.head:
<#if .locale == "zh_CN">
<#elseif .locale == "zh_TW">
<#elseif .locale == "ja_JP">
<#elseif .locale == "ko_KR">
<#elseif .locale == "th_TH">
</#if>
<#if record.custbody_subsidiary_logo?length != 0><#if subsidiary.internalid?string == '3'> <#elseif subsidiary.internalid?string == '4'> <#else> </#if> <#else> <#if companyInformation.logoUrl?length != 0> </#if> </#if> ${record@title}
${subsidiary.name}
<#if subsidiary.mainaddress_text?length != 0> ${subsidiary.mainaddress_text}
${subsidiary.phone}
${subsidiary.email}
<#if subsidiary.id == "3">accounts.uk@kamadojoe.com</#if>
<#if subsidiary.id == "3" && record.location.id != "225"> Our VAT Registration # GB 292 5730 83 <#elseif subsidiary.id == "3" && record.location.id == "225"> Our VAT Registration # NL 825 8328 95 B01 </#if> </#if>
**Shipping charges when applicable will be reflected on the invoice.**
“All deliveries from Kamado Joe must be inspected at time of delivery. Any discrepancies must be noted on delivery receipt or refused. Kamado Joe will not be responsible for any shortages or damages not reported at time of delivery.”
Page of
pdf.body:
${record.billaddress@label} ${record.shipaddress@label}
${record.billaddress}
VAT ${record.vatregnum} ${record.shipaddress}
${record.billphone}
Order Date ${record.trandate}
Account <#if record.entityname?length != 0>${record.entityname?split(" ")[0]} </#if>
${record.terms@label} ${record.terms}
${record.otherrefnum@label} ${record.otherrefnum}
${record.shipmethod@label} ${record.shipmethod}
Shipping Term FOB Shipping Point
${record.salesrep@label} ${record.salesrep}
<#if record.custbody_asn?length > 0>
ASN ${record.custbody_asn}
</#if>
${record@title} ${record.tranid}
<#if record.item?has_content>
<#list record.item as itemline> <#if itemline.item?length gt 0> <#if itemline_index==0>
${itemline.quantity@label} ${itemline.item@label} ${itemline.taxrate1@label} Unit Rate ${itemline.amount@label}
</#if>
${itemline.quantity} <#if itemline.itemtype == 'Discount'> ${itemline.item} &nsbp;
<#else> ${itemline.item}
${itemline.description} ${itemline.taxrate1} ${itemline.rate} </#if> ${itemline.amount}
</#if> </#list>
</#if>
<#if record.discounttotal?length != 0>
<#else>
</#if> <#if subsidiary.internalid?string == "3" && (record.terms == "Prepay" || record.terms == "Direct 30" || record.terms == "Direct 60" || record.terms == "Direct 90")>Payment Information:
<#if record.currency == "British pound"> Your prompt payment is greatly appreciated
Please make payment of this Sales Order to the following bank details:

Account No: 01670700

Discount ${record.discounttotal}
